controller

Class MineFinderController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.MineFinderController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer, ICellViewController, IHeaderController, IMenuController

    public class MineFinderController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer, ICellViewController, IMenuController, IHeaderController
    MineFinderController receives updates from a HeaderView, MenuView, Multiple CellViews, and Multiple Cell classes. Manages the flow of the MineFinderGame. Updates the view based on model changes. Updates the model based on user input to the view. The controller of the MVC pattern.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Steven Proctor

      • MineFinderController

        public MineFinderController()

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Sets the game controller for the Header and Menu. Creates the factories. Sets the initial game mode, size, and difficulty. Actives the sound, and formats the tilePane. Calls initializeView.

      • initializeView

        private void initializeView()
        Creates the minefield based on the size and difficulty. Initializes mineCount, unselectedCells, and gameOver. Adds this as an observer of each cell in the model. Adds CellViews to the tilePane. Sets the header text and initializes the game timer.

      • update

        public void update(java.util.Observable o,
                   java.lang.Object arg)
        Called whenever an object this is Observing changes. Used to Update CellViews and HeaderViews.
        Specified by:
        update in interface java.util.Observer
        Parameters:
        o - Object whose state has changed
        arg - not used

      • updateCell

        private void updateCell(Cell cell)
        Checks the current state of the cell model. Updates the view and game accordingly
        Parameters:
        cell - Cell whose state has changed

      • updateTimer

        private void updateTimer(IGameTimer gameTimer)
        Updates the timer display in the HeaderView. Calls game over if the timer runs out.
        Parameters:
        gameTimer - the game timer whose state has changed

      • setHidden

        private void setHidden(CellView cellView)
        Sets the cellView corresponding to the changed cell to a HiddenView. Increments mineCount and updates the HeaderView
        Parameters:
        cellView - CellView whose corresponding cell model has changed

      • setFlag

        private void setFlag(Cell cell,
                     CellView cellView)
        Sets the cellView to a flaggedView. Decrements mineCount and updates the HeaderView.
        Parameters:
        cell - the cell whose state has changed
        cellView - the cellView corresponding to the changed cell

      • setNumber

        private void setNumber(Cell cell,
                       CellView cellView)
        Sets the CellView to display the number of bombs surrounding the cell. Decrements unselectedCells. If the cell is surrounded by zero bombs, calls the selectNearbyCells method of the minefield. Calls game complete if the last non-bomb cell has been selected.
        Parameters:
        cell - the cell whose state has changed
        cellView - the cellView corresponding to the changed cell

      • gameComplete

        private void gameComplete()
        Stops the timer and game. Updates the header, calls flagRemainingBombs and showAlert

      • flagRemainingBombs

        private void flagRemainingBombs()
        Flags any bombs that were not flagged by the user. Any bombs that were correctly flagged by the user will display with a green background. All other flags will have a yellow background.

      • gameOver

        private void gameOver()
        Stops the timer and game. Updates the headerView, calls revealBombs, and showAlert

      • revealBombs

        private void revealBombs()
        Reveals the location of all bombs, and makes the background red. Any bombs that were correctly flagged by the user will be marked with a green background. Incorrect flags will retain a yellow background

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Stops the timer and resets the game. Re-sizes the window accordingly.
        Specified by:
        reset in interface IHeaderController

      • setTimer

        private void setTimer()
        Gets the appropriate GameTimer from the Factory

      • setDifficulty

        public void setDifficulty(java.lang.String difficulty)
        Sets the name of difficulty and gets the appropriate difficulty from the factory
        Specified by:
        setDifficulty in interface IMenuController
        Parameters:
        difficulty - String describing the desired difficulty

      • setSize

        public void setSize(java.lang.String size)
        Sets the name of the size and gets the appropriate size from the Factory
        Specified by:
        setSize in interface IMenuController
        Parameters:
        size - string describing the size of the minefield

      • setModeText

        public void setModeText(java.lang.String modeText)
        Sets the name of the game mode
        Specified by:
        setModeText in interface IMenuController
        Parameters:
        modeText - String describing the current game mode

        public void setSound(boolean sound)
        Turns the sound on and off CURRENTLY UNSUPPORTED
        Specified by:
        setSound in interface IMenuController
        Parameters:
        sound - True if the sound should be active

      • displayScores

        public void displayScores()
        Displays the scoreboard for the current game type. CURRENTLY UNSUPPORTED
        Specified by:
        displayScores in interface IMenuController

      • eraseScores

        public void eraseScores()
        Erases the scoreboard for the current game type CURRENTLY UNSUPPORTED
        Specified by:
        eraseScores in interface IMenuController

      • flagCell

        public void flagCell(CellView cellView)
        Calls the flag method of the cell corresponding to the given CellView
        Specified by:
        flagCell in interface ICellViewController
        Parameters:
        cellView - a CellView which has been flagged

      • selectCell

        public void selectCell(CellView cellView)
        Calls the select method of the cell corresponding to the given CellView
        Specified by:
        selectCell in interface ICellViewController
        Parameters:
        cellView - a CellView which has been selected

      • showAlert

        private void showAlert(java.lang.String content)
        Displays an alertBox informing the player that the game is over. Displays the endGame message and the amount of time the user was playing the game.
        Parameters:
        content - String describing the outcome of the game
